title: Team-Based Learning and Project-Based Education Program for Pragmatics Application

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: A corporate science education program conducted in a smartphone-centric, limited-technology environment, emphasizing asynchronous learning activities aligned with employees' work schedules.

learning_goals: Learners can design effective message delivery strategies by applying pragmatic principles in real scientific communication contexts
Learners can produce project outcomes that optimize scientific information contextually through team collaboration
Learners can diagnose nonverbal communication issues in educational settings and propose improvements using pragmatic analysis tools

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
